captions.text: Hi and welcome to a new video.
Today we don’t want to rely on our eyes but on our instincts.
With the help of a night vision device you can see what we can’t.
Let’s go!
For the first challenge I would suggest a penalty shootout.
How do you think we can best test our instincts?
We just switch off the lights in the run-up to the penalty.
In that case I stand no chance as a goalie.
Well, let’s find out.
I thought that was very difficult to begin with.
You have to orientate yourself first when the lights go off.
I agree that after an initial orientation phase it got better.
I think the only one who only had problems was the goalie Jan.
Yeah, I had no idea where the ball was going and could only guess.
I just had to jump towards the ball without knowing where it would go.
Well, you were successful on a few occasions.
We’re going to increase the difficulty slightly
and attempt a few volleys and headers.
I’ll cross the ball in for you.
So let’s find out how many you’ll manage to hit.
We hope you liked our challenge.
We also have a competition for you.
To take part you have to do the following.
Let us know in the comments section
who you think dealt the best with playing in the darkness.
You can win a Predator Instinct.
Have fun and see you in the next video.

title: freekickerz - Tested to the Limit: THE Ultimate Darkness Football Challenge
